name: Shimono Masaki no Fishing to Bassing
overview: Shimono Masaki no Fishing to Bassing ("Masaki Shimono's Fishing and Bassing") is a serious fishing game from Natsume for the Super Famicom. The player can customize every part of their angling experience, from the types of lures and sinkers they use from the many regions of each stage to try fishing. Half the difficulty is figuring out where the best fish are. The game was exclusive to the Super Famicom. Masaki Shimono, the professional angler, lent his name to the game.
